@description.name: @description
@description.body: Abstract base class for image cell renderer.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Compute the size of the given image

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map} A map containing the image's width and height
@return.description: A map containing the image's width and height

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Compute image meta data

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
imageData {Object|String} Either a string containing the image URL or a map, which describes the image. Map keys:
  • url (required)
  • width
  • height
  • tooltip
@param.description:
Either a string containing the image URL or a map, which describes the image. Map keys:
  • url (required)
  • width
  • height
  • tooltip

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{Object} A map describing the image. Map keys:
  • url
  • width
  • height
  • tooltip (optional)
@return.description:
A map describing the image. Map keys:
  • url
  • width
  • height
  • tooltip (optional)

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Identifies the Image to show. This is a template method, which must be implements by sub classes.

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{Map} A map having the following attributes:
  • "url": (type string) must be the URL of the image to show.
  • "width": (type int) the width of the image in pixels.
  • "height": (type int) the height of the image in pixels.
  • "tooltip": (type string) must be the image tooltip text.
@return.description:
A map having the following attributes:
  • "url": (type string) must be the URL of the image to show.
  • "width": (type int) the width of the image in pixels.
  • "height": (type int) the height of the image in pixels.
  • "tooltip": (type string) must be the image tooltip text.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@param.name: @param
@param.body: states {Object} A map containing the cell's state names as map keys.
@param.description: A map containing the cell's state names as map keys.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} The cell's content as HTML fragment.
@return.description: The cell's content as HTML fragment.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property appearance. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #appearance}.
